name: Srinivas Kadiyala
note: Nominated by Bill Matthews: for always asking questions & seeking to better understand  testing & technology and sharing his experiences and findings.

name: Christian Baumann
note: Nominated by Violetta Zhdanovich: 'He's a tester I look up to. Christian is an explorer, an investigator, a learner, a teacher, a great communicator and a team player. He's inspiring'

name: Conor Fitzgerald
note: Nominated by Michael: 'Conor is an active member of the test community and his talks covering Kanban are a great help for those looking at Kanban and Agile.'

name: Katrina Clokie
note: Katrinaâ€™s testing pathways are such great resources to help the test community learn different areas of testing!

name: Emna Ayadi
note: Nominated by Jasper: 'a true community hero - not only for the sfax meetups, but for global online coffee sesisons in a pandemic. And starting a snack exchange too'

name: Zubair Haque
note: Zubair has been a guest on the Test Guild podcast talking about testing performence of Microservice. He has years of performence testing exprience, and shares his knowledge with the community on Medium.

weblinks.name: ScalaTest Performance Testing Microservices with Zubair Haque

name: Josh Grant
note: Josh shares his testing thoughts, recently musing about a concept dear to my heat, Software that is good because it does what we expect.

weblinks.name: Twitter Thread: Software that works as expected

name: Guna Petrova
note: Nominated by Bill Matthews: for her unceasing enthusiasm, for testing, and being an awesome tester. And not least for being open and welcoming to all she meets.

name: Arun Motoori
note: Nominated by Sanjay Kumar: His passion to share knowledge help millions of people to build their career. Arun is an asset to Testing community. A great mentor, Leader and Trainer.
